verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei Now it came to pass in the days שְׁפֹ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> she-Fot when the judges הַשֹּׁפְטִ֔ים <S%H8199><s%> hash-sho-fe-Tim, ruled וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av that there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the land וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And a certain man מִבֵּ֧ית mib-Beit לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Le-chem of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah לָגוּר֙ <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to sojourn בִּשְׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> bis-Dei in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-To he and his wife וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and his two בָנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav. sons

וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem And the name הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish of the man אֱ‍ ֽלִימֶ֡לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> 'eli-Me-lech [was] Elimelech וְשֵׁם֩ <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name אִשְׁתּ֨וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To of his wife נָעֳמִ֜י <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi Naomi וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- of his two בָנָ֣יו׀ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav sons מַחְל֤וֹן <S%H4248><s%> mach-Lon Mahlon וְכִלְיוֹן֙ <S%H3630><s%> ve-chil-yOn and Chilion אֶפְרָתִ֔ים <S%H673><s%> 'ef-ra-Tim, Ephrathites מִבֵּ֥ית mib-Beit לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Le-chem of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; Judah וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And they came שְׂדֵי־ <S%H7704><s%> se-dei- into the country מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-yu- and remained שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died אֱלִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> 'e-li-Me-lech And Elimelech אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish husband נָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi; Naomi's וַתִּשָּׁאֵ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> vat-tish-sha-'Er and she was left הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and her two בָנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nei-ha. sons

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U And they took לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> na-Shim them wives מֹֽאֲבִיּ֔וֹת <S%H4125><s%> mo-'a-vi-Yot, of Moab שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat of the one עָרְפָּ֔ה <S%H6204><s%> 'a-re-Pah, [was] Orpah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit of the other ר֑וּת <S%H7327><s%> Rut; Ruth וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-she-vu and they dwelled שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there כְּעֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ke-'E-ser there about ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַיָּמ֥וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mu-tu died גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem also both מַחְל֣וֹן <S%H4248><s%> mach-Lon And Mahlon וְכִלְי֑וֹן <S%H3630><s%> ve-chil-Yon; and Chilion וַתִּשָּׁאֵר֙ <S%H7604><s%> vat-tish-sha-'Er was left הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, of them and the woman מִשְּׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> mish-she-Nei of her two יְלָדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3206><s%> ye-la-Dei-ha sons וּמֵאִישָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H376><s%> u-me-'i-Shah. and her husband

וַתָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> vat-Ta-kom Then she arose הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi he וְכַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H3618><s%> ve-chal-lo-Tei-ha, with her daughters in law וַתָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vat-Ta-shov that she might return מִשְּׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> mis-se-Dei from the country מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av; of Moab כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָֽׁמְעָה֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'Ah for she had heard בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> bis-Deh in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פָקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> fa-Kad had visited יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, his people לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet in giving לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. them bread

וַתֵּצֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> vat-te-Tze, Wherefore she went forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm out of the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-tah- become שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah, in it וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei where she was and her two כַלֹּתֶ֖יהָ <S%H3618><s%> chal-lo-Tei-ha daughters in law עִמָּ֑הּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah; her and they וַתֵּלַ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> vat-te-Lach-nah went בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> vad-De-rech, on the way לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv to return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz unto the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said נָעֳמִי֙ <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi And Naomi לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Tei unto her two כַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H3618><s%> chal-lo-Tei-ha, daughters in law לֵ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> Le-che-nah Go שֹּׁ֔בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> Shoe-nah, return אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah each לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house אִמָּ֑הּ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mah; to her mother's; יַעֲשֶׂה ya-'a-seh כיַ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Ya-'as deal קיְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Chem with חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed, kindly כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after עֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem deal עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַמֵּתִ֖ים <S%H4191><s%> ham-me-Tim with the dead וְעִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-ma-Di. with

יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten grant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וּמְצֶ֣אןָ <S%H4672><s%> u-me-Tze-na you that ye may find מְנוּחָ֔ה <S%H4496><s%> me-nu-Chah, rest אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah each בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [of you] in the house אִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah; of her husband וַתִּשַּׁ֣ק <S%H5401><s%> vat-tish-Shak Then she kissed לָהֶ֔ן la-Hen, וַתִּשֶּׂ֥אנָה <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Se-nah them and they lifted up קוֹלָ֖ן <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lan their voice וַתִּבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H1058><s%> vat-tiv-Kei-nah. and wept

וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה־ <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar-nah- And they said לָּ֑הּ Lah; כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- will surely אִתָּ֥ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach for נָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> na-Shuv unto her Surely we will return לְעַמֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mech. with thee unto thy people

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said נָעֳמִי֙ <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi And Naomi שֹׁ֣בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> Shoe-nah Turn again בְנֹתַ֔י <S%H1323><s%> ve-no-Tai, my daughters לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תֵלַ֖כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> te-Lach-nah go עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi; have I הַֽעֽוֹד־ <S%H5750><s%> ha-'od- yet לִ֤י li בָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim with me;[are] there yet [any more] sons בְּֽמֵעַ֔י <S%H4578><s%> be-me-'Ai, in my womb וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לַאֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> la-'a-na-Shim. he

שֹׁ֤בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> Shoe-nah Turn again בְנֹתַי֙ <S%H1323><s%> ve-no-Tai my daughters לֵ֔כְןָ <S%H1980><s%> Le-che-na, Go כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki If זָקַ֖נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> za-Kan-ti [your way] for I am too old מִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> mih-Yot to have לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish; to have an husband כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki If אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti If I should say יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- I have לִ֣י li תִקְוָ֔ה <S%H8615><s%> tik-Vah, hope גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> gam even הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah also to night לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish, [if] I should have an husband וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad-ti and should also bear בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim. sons

הֲלָהֵ֣ן׀ <S%H3860><s%> ha-la-Hen for them תְּשַׂבֵּ֗רְנָה <S%H7663><s%> te-sab-Be-re-nah, Would ye tarry עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִגְדָּ֔לוּ <S%H1431><s%> yig-Da-lu, till they were grown הֲלָהֵן֙ <S%H3860><s%> ha-la-Hen for them תֵּֽעָגֵ֔נָה <S%H5702><s%> te-'a-Ge-nah, ;would ye stay לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti because הֱי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> he-Yot become לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish; he אַ֣ל <S%H408><s%> 'al nay בְּנֹתַ֗י <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tai, my daughters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַר־ <S%H4843><s%> mar- for it grieveth לִ֤י li מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od me much מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem, than כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'Ah is gone out בִ֖י vi יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- for your sakes that the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַתִּשֶּׂ֣נָה <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Se-nah And they lifted up קוֹלָ֔ן <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lan, their voice וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ינָה <S%H1058><s%> vat-tiv-Kei-nah and wept again ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; again וַתִּשַּׁ֤ק <S%H5401><s%> vat-tish-Shak kissed עָרְפָּה֙ <S%H6204><s%> 'a-re-Pah and Orpah לַחֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H2545><s%> la-cha-mo-Tah, her mother in law וְר֖וּת <S%H7327><s%> ve-Rut but Ruth דָּ֥בְקָה <S%H1692><s%> Da-ve-kah clave בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer, And she said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שָׁ֣בָה <S%H7725><s%> Sha-vah is gone back יְבִמְתֵּ֔ךְ <S%H2994><s%> ye-vim-Tech, Behold thy sister in law אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to her עַמָּ֖הּ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mah unto her people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אֱלֹהֶ֑יהָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-ha; and unto her gods שׁ֖וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vi return אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei thou after יְבִמְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H2994><s%> ye-vim-Tech. thy sister in law

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said רוּת֙ <S%H7327><s%> rut And Ruth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּפְגְּעִי־ <S%H6293><s%> tif-ge-'i- Intreat בִ֔י Vi, לְעָזְבֵ֖ךְ <S%H5800><s%> le-'a-ze-Vech me not to leave לָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv thee [or] to return מֵאַחֲרָ֑יִךְ <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Ra-yich; from following after כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where תֵּלְכִ֜י <S%H1980><s%> te-le-Chi go אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech, will go וּבַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> u-va-'a-Sher and where תָּלִ֙ינִי֙ <S%H3885><s%> ta-Li-ni and where thou lodgest אָלִ֔ין <S%H3885><s%> 'a-Lin, I will lodge עַמֵּ֣ךְ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mech thy people עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, [shall be] my people וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Ha-yich and thy God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. my God
